channel.title: Logging Out Nulls
channel.description: I've just realized that sometimes when a player logs out, I guess it doesn't log them out completely or disconnect them fully and when they log out, they will leave a null in my player list. Now, I have added Coder Xynt's strong IP ban, which will stop people from intentionally nulling me if I IP ban them, but this is another thing when a player logs out. How can I fix this?

item.title: Logging Out Nulls
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

I’ve just realized that sometimes when a player logs out, I guess it doesn’t log them out completely or disconnect them fully and when they log out, they will leave a null in my player list. Now, I have added Coder Xynt’s strong IP ban, which will stop people from intentionally nulling me if I IP ban them, but this is another thing when a player logs out. How can I fix this?

Read full topic
